descriptions.Shade Moss: Thrives in dark environments, developed ability to photosynthesize using minimal light
descriptions.Water Moss: Aquatic variant that filters nutrients from water, forms dense underwater carpets
descriptions.Rock Moss: Hardy species that breaks down rock into soil, pioneer of barren landscapes
descriptions.Glow Moss: Bioluminescent moss that attracts nocturnal pollinators with soft blue light

descriptions.Tree Fern: Tall fern with woody trunk, reaches for canopy light in dense forests
descriptions.Climbing Fern: Vine-like fern that uses other plants for support, highly adaptable
descriptions.Aquatic Fern: Free-floating fern that forms vast mats on water surfaces
descriptions.Desert Fern: Drought-resistant fern with waxy coating and deep root system

descriptions.Night Bloom: Flower that opens only at night, pollinated by moths and bats
descriptions.Sun Seeker: Heliotropic flower that tracks the sun throughout the day
descriptions.Frost Flower: Cold-adapted flower that blooms in winter, antifreeze in petals
descriptions.Fire Lily: Fire-resistant flower that requires heat to germinate seeds

descriptions.Giant Redwood: Massive tree that can live thousands of years, creates own ecosystem
descriptions.Willow: Graceful tree with drooping branches, thrives near water
descriptions.Palm: Tropical tree with large fronds, adapted to coastal conditions
descriptions.Bonsai: Miniaturized tree that allocates resources for longevity over growth

descriptions.Mycelium Network: Underground fungal network that connects and nourishes multiple plants
descriptions.Spore Cloud: Fungus that releases massive spore clouds for wind dispersal
descriptions.Symbiotic Fungus: Forms beneficial partnerships with plant roots, enhancing nutrient uptake
descriptions.Luminescent Mushroom: Glowing fungus that attracts insects for spore dispersal

extinctionReasons: Couldn't adapt to changing atmospheric conditions
